Kevin Yang on Twitter

item.title: Gender differences in chess tournaments
item.description:
Florian Ederer on Twitter

‚ÄúWomen make more mistakes when playing against men in chess tournaments. Men play equally well against male and female opponents, but they persist longer before losing to women. One of my favorite recent papers, now published in QE: https://t.co/clRCgFsTcs‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/florianederer/status/1616522012083585029
